hooks.command: if [ "$(tmux display-message -p '#{pane_active}' 2>/dev/null)" != "1" ]; then session=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_name}' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); tmux_info=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_name}:#{window_index}.#{pane_index}'); notify-send -a "Claude Code ($session)" 'Permission Required' "From: $tmux_info"; fi

if [ "$(tmux display-message -p '#{pane_active}' 2>/dev/null)" != "1" ]; then session=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_name}' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); tmux_info=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_name}:#{window_index}.#{pane_index}'); notify-send -a "Claude Code ($session)" 'Input Required' "From: $tmux_info"; fi
